price: (6) That Day, the people will depart[1964] separated [into categories] to be shown [the result of] their deeds.
arabic: يَوۡمَئِذٖ يَصۡدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشۡتَاتٗا لِّيُرَوۡاْ أَعۡمَٰلَهُمۡ
footnotes: [1964]- From the place of Judgement to their final abode. Another interpretation is "emerge separately" (from the graves) .

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yawma-idhin yaṣduru al-nāsu ashtātan liyuraw aʿmālahum
